homepage.heroSubtitle: A white-label platform for reselling mobile airtime and data worldwide. Set your own pricing, manage your team, and process top-ups — all from one powerful dashboard.

howItWorks.title: Up and running in minutes
howItWorks.subtitle: Three simple steps from signup to your first sale.
howItWorks.step1Desc: Sign up in seconds. Set up your organization, invite your team, and configure roles — all from a single dashboard.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Link your DingConnect or Reloadly account with one API key. Products from 150+ countries sync automatically into your catalog.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Set your pricing, launch your branded storefront, and start processing top-ups. Revenue lands in your wallet instantly.

features.title: Everything you need to resell
features.subtitle: Built for speed, scale, and the flexibility modern businesses demand.
features.globalDesc: Reach customers in 150+ countries through DingConnect and Reloadly. Airtime, data, SMS, voice, and bundle products — all in one place.
features.pricingDesc: Region-based pricing rules, per-product markups, country-specific custom pricing, and automatic discount pipelines. Full control.
features.walletDesc: Fund your wallet, reserve balance per transaction, track every deposit and refund. Full audit trail with WalletTransaction history.
features.multitenantDesc: One platform, unlimited organizations. Granular role-based permissions — Admin, Operator, Viewer — per member, per org.
features.paymentsDesc: Accept payments via PGPay, Stripe, or PayPal. Webhook-verified delivery, automatic retries, and full payment lifecycle tracking.
features.analyticsDesc: Transaction dashboards, revenue metrics, customer insights, and operator performance — all updated in real time.

capabilities.title: Platform capabilities
capabilities.subtitle: The details that set us apart from generic top-up solutions.
capabilities.whitelabelDesc: Launch a fully branded storefront with your logo, colors, and domain. Customers never see our name — only yours. Configure branding, payment methods, and supported countries from a single settings panel.
capabilities.whitelabelBullet4: Branded customer portal with email verification
capabilities.apiDesc: Every feature is accessible via a versioned REST API. Scoped API keys, per-key rate limiting, and webhook notifications let you build custom integrations without friction.
capabilities.apiBullet2: Configurable rate limits per key & org
capabilities.apiBullet3: Webhook logs with automatic retry (6 attempts)
capabilities.customerDesc: Customers register, verify their email, manage their balance, and send top-ups themselves — reducing your support load and increasing conversion.
capabilities.customerBullet3: One-tap top-up from mobile or desktop
capabilities.securityDesc: RFC 7807 error responses, SHA-256 hashed credentials, HttpOnly session cookies, request-ID tracing, and complete audit trails make compliance straightforward.
capabilities.securityBullet3: Full audit trail on every wallet & balance change
capabilities.securityBullet4: Request-ID tracing across all API calls

trust.title: Built on trust
trust.securityDesc: SHA-256 hashed credentials, HttpOnly cookies, and full audit logging.
trust.retriesDesc: Webhook delivery with exponential backoff — up to 6 retry attempts.
trust.alertsDesc: Low-balance warnings, transaction status notifications, and more.
trust.emailDesc: Zeptomail, Mailgun, SendGrid, or Mailchimp — your choice.

faqSection.title: Common questions
faqSection.q1: How quickly can I start selling top-ups?
faqSection.a1: You can be live in under 10 minutes. Create an account, connect your DingConnect or Reloadly API key, configure your storefront branding, and you're ready. No code required.
faqSection.q2: What payment methods does the platform support?
faqSection.a2: PGPay is fully integrated with webhook-verified payment confirmation. Stripe and PayPal integrations are also available. You choose which payment methods to enable per organization.
faqSection.q3: How does the wallet system work?
faqSection.a3: You deposit funds into your organization wallet. When a customer completes a top-up, the cost is reserved from your wallet before the transfer is sent. Refunds are automatically returned on failure.
faqSection.a4: Yes. The platform is fully multi-tenant. You can create and switch between organizations, each with its own products, pricing, customers, wallet, and team members.
faqSection.a5: Absolutely. The Scale and Enterprise plans include full white-label storefronts — custom branding, your own domain, and customers never see our platform name.
faqSection.q6: What happens if a top-up fails?
faqSection.a6: The wallet reservation is automatically released and any captured payment is flagged for refund. The transaction is logged with a failure reason for your audit trail.

pricing.subtitle: Start for free and upgrade as you grow. No hidden fees, no surprises.
pricing.faq1Q: Can I change my plan at any time?
pricing.faq1A: Yes! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Upgrades take effect immediately, while downgrades will take effect at the end of your current billing period.
pricing.faq2Q: What happens if I exceed my transaction limit?
pricing.faq2A: You'll receive notifications when you approach your limit. To continue processing transactions, you'll need to upgrade to a higher tier. We'll never cut you off mid-transaction.
pricing.faq3A: Transaction fees are calculated as a percentage of each transaction and deducted automatically. Higher tiers have lower transaction fees, making them more cost-effective at scale.
pricing.faq4A: The Starter plan is free forever with no credit card required. You can test all basic features and upgrade when you're ready to scale.
pricing.faq5Q: What payment methods do you accept?
pricing.faq5A: We accept all major credit cards, debit cards, and ACH transfers for Enterprise plans. All payments are processed securely through Stripe.
pricing.faq6A: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee on all paid plans. If you're not satisfied, contact our support team for a full refund.
